org.pojava.persistence.serial
Class XmlSerializer

java.lang.Object
  org.pojava.persistence.serial.XmlSerializer

public class XmlSerializer
extends java.lang.Object

The XmlSerializer class converts a Java Object to XML.

Author:
John Pile
